posts.post_title: FS- Cheap raw HoF lot - 10 cards 1K.  PD, SC,OM, PB, Sov backs
posts.post_content: $1,000 net to me shipped & insured BMWT.  Note - I know Chase isn't a HoF.

If you are willing to split, I might be interested in Joss.

If not, no worries, and GLWS!

Ed
